$hyoo_meta_safe_Export_link_title: This link contains your encrypted prvate keys. Save it to a secure place on another physical device. Using this link you can restore your private keys by enterig same password.
$hyoo_meta_safe_Expot_bid_text: Your private keys are stored in the browser. In order not to lose them, it is recommended to come up with a strong password for exporting them.
$hyoo_meta_safe_Iport_descr_text:
To import a private key, you must enter the password from it.
**If the current key is not saved, it will be lost forever.**
